articles.description: Gold Coast-based textile artist Peter Tamasese is revitalising traditional upeti art — common in the making of tapa — painting them on his quirky and colourful line of kaftans.
articles.content:
For over a decade, Peter Tamasese greeted passengers, conducted safety demonstrations and shuffled food and beverages down the aisles as a flight attendant in the skies above the Pacific.
Key points… [+6674 chars]

articles.content: The wildest phone of late 2020, the LG Wing ($999) has a unique swiveling screen that brings a breath of fresh, creative air to the stale world of rectangular smartphones. Its T-shaped two-screen lay… [+15957 chars]

articles.author: Lexy Savvides
articles.title: Is the iPhone 12 waterproof? We took it for a swim to test its water resistance - CNET
articles.description: Apple's iPhone 12 put up a good fight after being submerged in the chilly waters of Lake Tahoe.
articles.content: We know the iPhone 12 can handle spills and splashes, but Apple may be downplaying just how water-resistant this phone really is. The iPhone 12's IP68 rating means it can survive up to 19.6 feet (6 m… [+5264 chars]
